mapper.delete: delete from store_audit where user_id=#{uid} and create_date = (select MAX(CREATE_DATE) from store_audit WHERE user_id=#{uid})
mapper.select: select audit_id,audit_name,credit_code,contact_name,contact_phone, company_address,business_license,store_description,approval_status,CREATE_DATE from store_audit order by CREATE_DATE DESC ;
select count(audit_id) from store_audit where audit_name=#{auditName}
select approval_status from store_audit WHERE user_id=#{uid} order by CREATE_DATE DESC limit 1;
select * from store_audit WHERE user_id=#{uid} order by CREATE_DATE DESC limit 1;
